entities.name: death
entities.description: Death is introduced as a character who has the power to take lives. He is described as picking up a stone from the riverbank and giving it to the second brother.

entities.name: second brother
entities.description: The second brother is introduced as an arrogant man who wants to humiliate Death further by asking for the power to recall others from Death.

entities.name: third and youngest brother
entities.description: The third and youngest brother is described as humble and wise. He does not trust Death and asks for something that will enable him to go forth without being followed by Death.

relationships.description: Death gave the power to recall others from Death to the second brother, represented by a stone.
Death handed over his own Cloak of Invisibility to the third and youngest brother.
